Definition.Document:
Pump Thrust Analysis

Objective

One of the important performance parameter for any centrifugal pump is its bearing life. To have the minimum maintenance and repairs cost, the bearing life for any centrifugal pump must be as prolonged as far as possible. Particularly in case of process pumps, which are used at high temperatures, high pressure and more hazardous applications with maximum reliability, bearing life is of more importance. Bearing life. of centrifugal pump depends upon the forces acting on the impeller i. e. radial and axial thrust. We also use to validate the instrument measurements to justify alerts.


Steps to Calculate

1. Raw data for pump thrust measurement 1.    

$rows = $datasource.query('SELECT "Date","Thrust B" FROM CSVREAD("Nov2018vibandthrust-2editedR2_v2.csv")', 'Date')$rows.transformToSamples($row ->sample($row.get(0).toTime(),$row.get(1)),500h).setCertain().toLinear()

2. Raw data for pump thrust measurement 2.

3. Cleansed thrust signal for reading 1.    

$a.agileFilter(15min)


4. Cleansed thrust signal for reading 2.

5. Validate thrust reading differences.

6. Instrument reading validation.

7. Thrust deviation Alert 1 & Alert 2

8.Operational Delta 1 & Delta 2

9. Thrust transient change 1 & change 2

10. Final view


Notes

1. Threshold defined based on assumption

Reference

15th International Conference on Experimental Mechanics- AXIAL THRUST IN CENTRIFUGAL PUMPS - EXPERIMENTAL ANALYSIS
